description: The issue identified in the Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) versions is rooted in a flaw within the underlying architecture of the rendering engine. This defect leads to improper handling of certain URL schemes, allowing for unexpected behavior or performance issues. The specific build numbers affected include 120.0.2210.133 and 120.0.2336.0. This improper handling can occur during the processing of navigation requests, enabling potential disruptions in user experience and application functionality. Additionally, the defect has been documented in KB-120.0.2210.133, which provides further context on the nature of these issues and guidance for mitigation.
